attributes.action: retain offender management as the responsibility of a publicly accountable probation service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Although the Offender Management Bill scraped through the Commons there is plenty of time to re-think the proposal to privatize probation. The probation service has its failings but it knows something about offender management - Big Business does not. Whom would you prefer to manage sex offenders in your neighbourhood - an expert or an accountant? Unlike the present probation service, private contractors will be completely unaccountable to the public. Even their contracts will be secret. Abolish NOMS instead - a total waste of public money.
